column4: Need help: folks, I've spent the better part of a day trying to figure out how to create a launcher on the desktop to simply run a script to run vncviewer 192.168.0.100
link to a good tutorial to launch script from a launcher?
not to detract from what you're doing, but have you tried gnomeRDP?
yes, and don't like it because I have a dual monitor on the XP machine, and only vnc seems to deal with that properly
